original_title: The Socks and Squimmy Show - Episode One - The Visitor
overview: Socks and Squimmy are two peanut farmers living the easy life. One night, while out star-gazing, they spot a UFO crash into the nearby forest. They investigate to find a space-pod with a little alien inside. They bring the little alien home, thinking they have found a new friend, who makes himself very comfortable in Socks and Squimmy's house.
title: The Socks and Squimmy Show - Episode One - The Visitor
